        Construct a new Canopy builder
        Parameters:
        headerWithSummary - the header of the data with summary attributes
        headerNoSummary - the header of the data without summary attributes
        canopyMapTask - the configured map task to use
        csvMapTaskOptions - options for csv parsing

      • getFinalizedClusterer

        public Clusterer getFinalizedClusterer()
                                throws DistributedWekaException
        Return the finalized clusterer. This method should only be called after finishedInput().
        Returns:
        the finalized clusterer
        Throws:
        DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs
